Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 12th sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The photographs show enemy prisoners of war and casualties.The Mao quotation reads "American imperialism and reactionaries in various countries are paper tigers. The Chinese people's struggle has made this clear. The Vietnamese people's struggle is making this clear."
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
